text: Punta Stilo Lighthouse () is an active lighthouse on the Ionian Sea along the coast of Calabria in the municipality of Monasterace. ==Description== The works to build the tower started in 1891 and the light was lit the first time in May 1895.Il Faro ViviKaulon. Retrieved February 27, 2018 The tower, attached to 1-storey keeper's house, has an octagonal prism shape and it is built in masonry. It is white painted with black horizontal bands, has a height of and is placed at above sea level. The lighthouse emits three white flashes in a 15 seconds period visible up to . The light is operated by the Lighthouses Service of Marina Militare identified by the code number 3388 E.F. ==See also== *List of lighthouses in Italy == References == ==External links== * Servizio Fari Marina Militare Category:Lighthouses in Italy Category:Buildings and structures in Reggio Calabria
title: Punta Stilo Lighthouse
